languages.text: "Авария, все в огне, мертвых уйма. Кто заживо погорел, кто дымом задохнулся, но ничего — спасем родной корабль!"
"It's a big ol' accident. Everything's on fire, and the place is packed with corpses. Some burned alive, others choked on smoke, but we'll save our home ship. Just you wait and see!"
languages.original_text: "Авария, все в огне, мертвых уйма. Кто заживо погорел, кто дымом задохнулся, но ничего — спасем родной корабль!"

"It's a big ol' accident. Everything's on fire, and the place is packed with corpses. Some burned alive, others choked on smoke, but we'll save our home ship. Just you wait and see!"

languages.text: "Ein verdammter Unfall. Alles steht in Flammen und überall liegen Leichen rum. Einige sind lebendig verbrannt, andere am Rauch erstickt, aber wir werden unser Heimatschiff retten. Ihr werdet schon sehen!"
languages.original_text: "It's a big ol' accident. Everything's on fire, and the place is packed with corpses. Some burned alive, others choked on smoke, but we'll save our home ship. Just you wait and see!"

traits.locale_text: "Ein verdammter Unfall. Alles steht in Flammen und überall liegen Leichen rum. Einige sind lebendig verbrannt, andere am Rauch erstickt, aber wir werden unser Heimatschiff retten. Ihr werdet schon sehen!"

languages.text: « C'est un accident monstre. Tout est en feu et on ne compte plus les cadavres. Certains ont été brûlés vifs, d'autres ont été étouffés par la fumée, mais nous sauverons notre vaisseau. Vous verrez ! »
languages.original_text: "It's a big ol' accident. Everything's on fire, and the place is packed with corpses. Some burned alive, others choked on smoke, but we'll save our home ship. Just you wait and see!"

traits.locale_text: « C'est un accident monstre. Tout est en feu et on ne compte plus les cadavres. Certains ont été brûlés vifs, d'autres ont été étouffés par la fumée, mais nous sauverons notre vaisseau. Vous verrez ! »

languages.text: «Ha sido un accidente espantoso. Todo está ardiendo y el lugar está lleno de cadáveres. Algunos han ardido y otros se han asfixiado por el humo, pero lograremos salvar la nave. ¡Ya lo verá!».
languages.original_text: "It's a big ol' accident. Everything's on fire, and the place is packed with corpses. Some burned alive, others choked on smoke, but we'll save our home ship. Just you wait and see!"

traits.locale_text: «Ha sido un accidente espantoso. Todo está ardiendo y el lugar está lleno de cadáveres. Algunos han ardido y otros se han asfixiado por el humo, pero lograremos salvar la nave. ¡Ya lo verá!».

languages.text: 「大事故ですよ。すべてが炎上していて、この場所は死体であふれかえっている。生きたまま焼かれた者もいれば、煙で窒息した者もいる。それでも母船は救ってみせます。どうか見ていてください！」
languages.original_text: "It's a big ol' accident. Everything's on fire, and the place is packed with corpses. Some burned alive, others choked on smoke, but we'll save our home ship. Just you wait and see!"

traits.locale_text: 「大事故ですよ。すべてが炎上していて、この場所は死体であふれかえっている。生きたまま焼かれた者もいれば、煙で窒息した者もいる。それでも母船は救ってみせます。どうか見ていてください！」

languages.text: “发生了非常严重的事故，所有的东西都着火了，到处都是尸体。有人被活活烧死，有人被烟呛死，但我们一定能保住这艘船！您就仔细瞧着吧！”
languages.original_text: "It's a big ol' accident. Everything's on fire, and the place is packed with corpses. Some burned alive, others choked on smoke, but we'll save our home ship. Just you wait and see!"

traits.locale_text: “发生了非常严重的事故，所有的东西都着火了，到处都是尸体。有人被活活烧死，有人被烟呛死，但我们一定能保住这艘船！您就仔细瞧着吧！”

languages.text: "Amma büyük bir kaza. Her şey ateş içinde, ortalık cesetten geçilmiyor. Kimi canlı canlı yandı, kimi dumandan boğuldu ama gemimizi kurtaracağız. Bekleyin de görün!"
languages.original_text: "It's a big ol' accident. Everything's on fire, and the place is packed with corpses. Some burned alive, others choked on smoke, but we'll save our home ship. Just you wait and see!"
